name: Deltek, Inc
tag_list: enterprise-software, information-solutions, enterprise-software-solutions, erp, crm, project-management, program-management, project-accounting, accounting-software, timekeeping-software, evm
overview: Deltek is the leading global provider of enterprise software and information solutions for professional services firms and government contractors. 15,000 organizations and 1.9 million users in over 80 countries around the world rely on Deltek to research and identify opportunities, win new business, optimize resources, streamline operations, and deliver more profitable projects.
